SEARCH
Module com.example.historian
Package com.example.historian.models.account

Class MockAccountDAO

java.lang.Object
com.example.historian.models.account.MockAccountDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAccountDAO
public class MockAccountDAO extends Object implements IAccountDAO
Mock implementation of the IAccountDAO interface for testing purposes. This class uses an in-memory list to store accounts.
